title: Phi Theta Kappa Scholarship - Coastal Carolina University
Description:: The Phi Theta Kappa Scholarship is available to incoming transfer students at Coastal Carolina University.  You must have earned at least 30 credit hours, have a minimum 3.0 GPA and be a member of Phi Theta Kappa to qualify for this renewable award.

title: Nursing Alumni Scholarship
Description:: The Nursing Alumni Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage who are studying nursing.

title: College of DuPage Faculty Association Scholarship
Description:: The College of DuPage Faculty Association Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.

title: Wilbur Walker Dodge Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Wilbur Walker Dodge Memorial Scholarship is available to students studying engineering at the College of DuPage.

title: Jill Johnson Hall Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Jill Johnson Hall Memorial Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.

title: Elmhurst Rotary Club Vocational/Technical Scholarship
Description:: The Elmhurst Rotary Club Vocational/Technical Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must demonstrate financial need and pursing education in vocational and technical courses to be eligible for this award.

title: Walter Jones Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Walter Jones Memorial Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be studying behavioral sciences to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of Alabama, Birmingham - School of Business
title: Pricewaterhouse Coopers Scholarship - UAB
Description:: The Pricewaterhouse Coopers Scholarship is available to entering freshmen students at the University of Alabama, Birmingham.  You must be majoring in accounting and have a minimum 3.0 GPA to be eligible for this award.

title: Greg Joos Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Greg Joos Memorial Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must demonstrate financial need and first in your family to attend college to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of Alabama, Birmingham - School of Business
title: Roberta M. and John L. Rhoads Accounting Scholarship
Description:: The Roberta M. and John L. Rhoads Accounting Scholarship is available to senior accounting majors at the University of Alabama, Birmingham.  You must have a minimum 3.0 overall GPA and a minimum 3.25 GPA in accounting, have completed AC 300 and AC 310, and demonstrate need, extracurricular, and civic and professional activities.

title: Mary Mack Scholarship
Description:: The Mary Mack Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: S.C. Reed Scholarship
Description:: The S.C. Reed Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be studying in the math and applied sciences area with a preference given to students majoring in the field of engineering to be eligible for this award.

title: Veterans Textbook Scholarship
Description:: The Veterans Textbook Scholarship is available to veteran students at the College of DuPage.

title: COD Foundation's Textbook Scholarship
Description:: The College of DuPage Faculty Association Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.

title: COD Foundation's Achievers Scholarship
Description:: The COD Foundation's Achievers Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.5 to be eligible for this award.

title: Troy Scholarship for Engineering
Description:: The Troy Scholarship for Engineering is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be majoring in engineering to be eligible for this award.

title: Troy Scholarship for Nursing
Description:: The Troy Scholarship for Nursing is available to students at the College of DuPage who are studying nursing.

title: Everyone Matters Scholarship Fund
Description:: The Everyone Matters Scholarship Fund is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must demonstrate learning disabilities to be eligible for this ward.

title: Marriott Chicagoland Business Council Hospitality Scholarship
Description:: The Marriott Chicagoland Business Council Hospitality Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be majoring in hospitality to be eligible for this award.

title: Dr. Joseph and Donna Collins Student Success Scholarship
Description:: The Dr. Joseph and Donna Collins Student Success Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

title: Naperville Community Gardeners Scholarship
Description:: The Naperville Community Gardeners Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be enrolled in the horticulture program to be eligible for this award.

title: The Christopher Drop Welding Scholarship
Description:: The Christopher Drop Welding Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be majoring in welding to be eligible for this award.

title: 3+1 Healthcare Scholarship
Description:: The 3+1 Healthcare Scholarship is available to students at the College of DuPage.  You must be majoring in healthcare to be eligible for this award.

title: Veterans Healthcare Scholarship
Description:: The Veterans Healthcare Scholarship is available to veteran students at the College of DuPage.  You must be majoring in healthcare to be eligible for this award.

title: Betty and Ron Krupp Veterans Scholarship
Description:: The Betty and Ron Krupp Veterans Scholarship is available to veteran students at the College of DuPage.

title: Regents' Scholarship
Description:: The Regents Academic Scholarship is available to entering freshmen students at Concordia College, New York.  You must have minimum SAT of 1110, minimum SAT of 24 and minimum GPA of 3.5 to be eligible for this award.
